meanings.definition: The act of adding garlic to a dish for flavor.
meanings.sent1: I love the garlicking in my mom's spaghetti sauce.
meanings.sent2: The garlicking in the soup made it taste delicious.
meanings.sent3: The garlicking in the salad gave it a nice kick.
meanings.sent4: Her garlicking in the stew was like a magic touch.
meanings.sent5: The garlicking in the marinade was so aromatic.

meanings.definition: The process of rubbing garlic on something.
meanings.sent1: She used garlicking to season the bread before baking.
meanings.sent2: The garlicking on the meat enhanced its flavor.
meanings.sent3: His garlicking on the pan made it smell amazing.
meanings.sent4: The garlicking on the chicken was like a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent5: The garlicking on the fish was so fragrant.

meanings.definition: The practice of using garlic in cooking.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's garlicking always made her dishes special.
meanings.sent2: The garlicking in the sauce was just right.
meanings.sent3: Their garlicking in the stir-fry was a bit too much.
meanings.sent4: The garlicking in the curry was like a burst of flavor.
meanings.sent5: The garlicking in the pasta was so tasty.
